data.title: Ecolint: International School of Geneva
data.meta_description: Ecolint is the world's first international school. A pioneer in international education for 100 years.
data.text:
Ecole Internationale de Genève

The world's first international school.

A pioneer in international education for 100 years.

What sets us apart

Incomparably international

130 nationalities, 80 home languages: an international environment with unrivalled diversity.

A school for peace and humanitarian values

A not-for-profit foundation, our concept of education for peace is at the heart of everything we do.

Innovative, inclusive and academically rigorous

The world's first international school, where every student is welcome and can realise their full potential.

Our programmes

The birthplace of the International Baccalaureate, and pioneer in child-centred education, Ecolint ensures that every student's individual needs are met.

Much more than a school!

On each of our three campuses, students have access to a vast array of Extra-Curricular Activities, designed to broaden their horizons and develop new skills.

Our three campuses

Our school has grown over time to meet increasing demand. Our three magnificent campuses, which today welcome 4,450 students, are united by the same values, while each having their own distinctive feel.

Primary • Middle • Secondary

La Grande Boissière

Rue Marie-Thérèse-Maurette 7

CH-1208 Genève

Primary • Secondary

La Châtaigneraie

2, chemin de la Ferme

CH-1297 Founex

Primary • Secondary

Campus des Nations

11, route des Morillons

CH-1218 Le Grand-Saconnex

Ecolint Camps

Register for our school holiday camps!

L’Ecole Internationale de Genève offers camps for 3 to 13 year olds during the school holidays. Our camps run from Monday to Friday (except public holidays) from 8h00 to 17h30 on our campuses in Geneva and Founex. Both staffing and facilities meet the very highest standards.

Guest Speaker Series

In order to expose our students to different world views, we invite guest speakers from across the world to come and share their stories and experiences. Whether they come from the worlds of literature, art, politics, journalism or sport, our guest speakers all share the same ability to inspire others through their personal testimony. Most guest speaker events are open to the public.

Accreditations
